.. _typo3_console-command-reference-upgrade-list:

============
upgrade:list
============


**List upgrade wizards**





Options
=======

`--all|-a`
   If set, all wizards will be listed, even the once marked as ready or done

- Accept value: no
- Is value required: no
- Is multiple: no
- Default: false
